General.Name: Cpi Property Group SA
General.Description: CPI Property Group operates as a property investor and developer in Central Europe. Its portfolio comprises real estate assets in the Czech and Slovak Republics, including residential, retail, hospitality, and industrial projects. CPI Property Group is headquartered in Luxembourg, Luxembourg.
